      Returns a list of all neighbors of a given vertex.

      Reads the graph structure from a file.
      Parameters:

      Throws:

      Checks if graph consists the given vertex.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getMaxVertexNumber

      int getMaxVertexNumber()
      Returns the number of the maximum node.
      Returns:
